body.p: An entity may designate an item in its entirety or a portion of an item as the hedged item in a hedging relationship. Paragraphs 81 and AG99F of IAS 39 allow entities to designate only changes in the cash flows or fair value of an item attributable to a specific risk or risks (risk portion).
